We made an experi ment of word clustering on the 4178 sentences of text data quoted from computer manuals. In this experiment, a special treatment was taken for compound words to ensure information.

There are many compound words in Japanese sentences which are made by combining words and act as one word. They are called Fuku9ogo in Japanese. If we great them all as different from each other, many words appear rarely, so that the relating pat.terns of each word cannot be captured sufficiently.
